deploy.startCommand: echo 'Starting migrations...' && python manage.py migrate --verbosity 1 && echo 'Audit DB...' && python manage.py migrate --database=audit --verbosity 1 && echo 'Seeding...' && (python manage.py seed || echo 'Seed failed, continuing...') && echo 'Starting gunicorn on port '$PORT && gunicorn konote.wsgi:application --bind 0.0.0.0:$PORT --workers 2 --log-level info --error-logfile - --access-logfile -
